gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 134, Trail Blazers 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Trail Blazers, 134-91. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 28 points, four assists, and three rebounds for the Thunder, with Chet Holmgren adding 16 points and six rebounds in the victory. Jabari Walker tallied 13 points, seven rebounds, and two assists for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Thunder have won 5 games in a row and improve to 10-5 in the regular season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 3-10.
